title: Are there settings to control recording volume/ sound saturation in Recorder App?
content:
I just upgraded from iPhone to Pixel, and love most aspects of this phone. One main reason I didn't change sooner was due to sound quality when recording live music. I read an article recently that indicated that this issue was resolved.

First recording yesterday; static from over saturation was so bad I can't even recognize what I was recording. PLEASE tell me there is something I can adjust for this!
